Name: Bladetail Sturgeon
Description: A very dangerous fish. It's tail is as sharp as a blade. It is believed that their endangered status is caused by overhunting, for their tails may have served as arrow heads in ancient times.

DescriptionLocalization.es: Un pez muy peligroso. Su cola es tan afilada como una hoja de espada. Se cree que su estado de peligro de extinción se debe a la caza excesiva, ya que su cola puede haber servido como punta de flecha en la antigüedad.
